Title etched in pulsating crimson across black velvet.
Distant chorus whispers behind closed doors.
Hand lifts, palm open to unseen sky.
A diamond ring balanced on a razor-thin crack, glinting before the split.
Infinity symbol made of pale light, slowly fraying at both ends.
Silver tambourine jangling in an echo chamber of dusk.
Title flickers like a stove coil heating red.
Hand clutches doorway frame in reluctance.
Road sign points toward uncertain distance.
Title pulses like club sign switching from red to violet.
Translucent figure rises out of dancer’s chest.
Empty silhouette outlined by laser lights.
Title arcs across night highway in neon cursive.
Pedestrian waits, thumb tucked, no sign out.
Empty motorcycle idles under street-lamp.
A lone ear suspended in darkness, sound-rings rippling toward it.
A mouth frozen open beneath water, bubbles replacing the cry.
A body tumbling through night, street-lamp trails smearing like comets.
Title hangs like a welcome-home banner under soft gym lights.
Calendar pages flutter, settling on the present.
Sentence fragments fade into hush.
Title glows half-lit like a rehearsal sign above a dark stage.
Two silhouettes stand back-to-back, dialogue bubbles sealed.
Audio meter flatlines to a thin green bar.

A cozy, vintage café tucked into a quiet city street corner.
Seagulls circling the misty pier, soft golden light reflecting on water.
Title set in raven-black calligraphy over twilight.
Footsteps begin along a dim shoreline.
Path winds through driftwood like question marks.
Title blazes neon over midnight booth.
Fader slides; crowd hushes, bass awaiting drop.
Closed lids shimmer with strobe reflections.
Massive ceremonial gates swinging wide, carved with constellations.
Winged structures unfurl like origami into the sky above the gates.
DNA helixes spiraling upward into forms of wings and light.

intent:
HT Ordered Sequence Generator

This script generates Codex entries that follow the EXACT shot order from the prompts file.
It ensures that the video frames are sequenced exactly as specified in the or

intent:
CLAPPER62SINGLESHOT - Generates images for the longest poem for video creation.
- Uses UPDATED-TIMELINE.json from the HONEYBADGER directory.
- Identifies the longest poem by number of entries (frames)

A symbolic tableau rendered through chiaroscuro lighting.

Title flickers like a stove coil heating red.
Hand clutches doorway frame in reluctance.
Road sign points toward uncertain distance.
intent:
HM Special Video Generator
This script specifically generates the HM (Hot Minute) video using the images from HM directory
and the shot information from HM_prompts.md file.

sample_prompts: Massive ceremonial gates swinging wide, carved with constellations.
Winged structures unfurl like origami into the sky above the gates.
DNA helixes spiraling upward into forms of wings and light.
intent:
AT Special Video Generator
This script specifically generates the AT (Atlantis) video using the images from AT_shots directory
and the information from ImageSequence.md file.
